title: The penalty will be recovered from the date of commencement of unauthorized use till the day non-IT use continues
clause_text: The penalty will be recovered from the date of commencement of unauthorized use till the day non-IT use continues.
section: (1) 7.8.1 For Municipal Corporations in Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Pune Metropolitan Region.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The penalty will be recovered from the date of commencement of unauthorized use till the day non-IT use continues.
